content:
# I successfully harvested 1 stone, and my inventory now reflects that I have 1 stone and 10 copper ore. 
# However, I still need 4 more stones to craft the stone furnace. 

# I will attempt to harvest additional stones until I reach the required amount.
harvest_resource(nearest(Resource.Stone), quantity=4)  # Harvest 4 more stones. 
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory again.
